name: Madagascar 3 & The Croods Prehistoric Party Combo Pack
name_original: Madagascar 3 & The Croods Prehistoric Party Combo Pack
description:
In the Madagascar 3 & The Croods Prehistoric Party Combo Pack players of
all ages will get to travel, adventure and explore in the exciting and
worldly European locations of Madagascar 3! They'll also get the
ultimate fun of a family party game with Croods-style action as they
journey through 30 unique and addictive mini-games.

Multiple Playable Characters: All the Madagascar favorites are back –
Alex, Marty, Melman and Gloria. Also featuring all new show-stopping
characters from Madagascar 3!

Action-adventure, platforming and mini-game circus fun for Madagascar
fans of all ages! Explore iconic locations around Europe & perform
show-stopping circus acts, Madagascar style!

Play as any one of the lovable Croods family members – Grug, Ugga,
Eep, Thunk, Sandy, Gran and Guy!

Features spectacular landscapes and never-before-seen creatures from
the The Croods film!
